Posts.Content: Sep 19, 2010 07:40PM - edited Sep 19, 2010 07:41PM by imdavidson Hi, I write about this topic and have a book out on it that I coauthored with Dr. Dan Silverman at UCLA.  (I've also had breast cancer and chemotherapy).  If you would like to see some articles directly related to word retrieval, multitasking and memory problems related to chemo, please visit www.YourBrainAfterChemo.blogspot.com and put "How Chemotherapy Changes the Way You Think" in the search box.  Or you may just want to browse the site where I believe you'll find useful information to help you.  All the best to you.  Idelle Davidson Coauthor, "Your Brain After Chemo: A Practical Guide to Lifting the Fog and Getting Back Your Focus"
